Data Visualization.tool_description: Clustering of samples based on gene expression
Analysis of readcount distribution for the samples within the dataset

Differential Expression.tool_description: Plot the logFC and average expression values resulting from a differential expression analysis
Plot the logFC and logP values resulting from a differential expression analysis

Signature Analysis.tool_description: Enrichment analysis of the top most overexpressed and underexpressed genes from a differential expression analysis.
Identify small molecules which mimic or reverse a given differential gene expression signature.
